evidence.claim: Semma Health utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The company processes X12 transactions such as 837 and 270 for healthcare claims.
FHIR is leveraged for patient data exchange.
Integration with EHR systems is facilitated via RESTful APIs.
HL7 standards are applied in their health information exchanges.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in health data exchange using X12 transactions and FHIR standards.
matched_use_cases: Webhook integrations for real-time data exchange
